widgets.title: Device Owner's Digital Identities and Access

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND Device 
  WITH 
    macAddress = "{{macAddress or hostname or email or ipAddress}}"
  OR
    ipAddress = "{{macAddress or hostname or email or ipAddress}}"
  OR
    hostname = "{{macAddress or hostname or email or ipAddress}}"
  OR
    email = "{{macAddress or hostname or email or ipAddress}}"
  OR
    owner = "{{macAddress or hostname or email or ipAddress}}"
  OR
    user = "{{macAddress or hostname or email or ipAddress}}"
THAT (OWNS|HAS) Person
THAT IS User 
THAT (HAS|ASSIGNED) (Account|AccessRole|AccessKey|Application)
RETURN TREE

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND Device 
  WITH 
    macAddress = "{{macAddress or hostname or email or ipAddress}}"
  OR
    ipAddress = "{{macAddress or hostname or email or ipAddress}}"
  OR
    hostname = "{{macAddress or hostname or email or ipAddress}}"
  OR
    email = "{{macAddress or hostname or email or ipAddress}}"
  OR
    owner = "{{macAddress or hostname or email or ipAddress}}"
  OR
    user = "{{macAddress or hostname or email or ipAddress}}"
THAT (OWNS|HAS) Person
THAT IS User 
THAT (HAS|ASSIGNED) (Account|AccessRole|AccessKey|Application) as entity
RETURN entity._type as accessType, count(entity) as accessCount order by accessCount DESC

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND Unique Device 
  WITH 
    macAddress = "{{macAddress or hostname or email or ipAddress}}"
  OR
    ipAddress = "{{macAddress or hostname or email or ipAddress}}"
  OR
    hostname = "{{macAddress or hostname or email or ipAddress}}"
  OR
    email = "{{macAddress or hostname or email or ipAddress}}"
  OR
    owner = "{{macAddress or hostname or email or ipAddress}}"
  OR
    user = "{{macAddress or hostname or email or ipAddress}}"
(that (has|owns) (Person|User))?
that has (Finding|Problem) as f
return 
  f._type, 
  f.displayName, 
  f.description, 
  f.severity, 
  f.numericSeverity,
  f.status,
  f.createdOn,
  f.updatedOn,
  f.webLink
